p.s: Description of Nocardia cyriacigeorgici sp. nov.

Nocardia cyriacigeorgici (cy.ri.a.ci.ge.or'gi.ci. Gr. neut. n. kyriako'n house of the lord, church; M.L. neut. n. cyriacum, cyriaci church; Gr. adj. georgikos related to agriculture, related to St George; M.L. adj. georgicus of St George; M.L. adj. cyriacigeorgici of St George's church, referring to the origin of the name of the German town Gelsenkirchen where the type strain was isolated)
Hyphae are Gram-positive and slightly acid-alcohol-fast.
The vegetative hyphae are well-developed with irregular branches penetrating the agar and bear white aerial hyphae.
At a late stage of growth, the hyphae fragment into rod-shaped elements.
The organism contains meso-diaminopimelic acid, galactose and arabinose in whole-cell hydrolysates (i.e. cell wall chemotype IV).

It has mycolic acids with 46-54 carbon atoms and 0-3 double bonds (C46:0, C46:3, C48:0, C48:3, C50:0, C50:1, C50:3, C52:0, C52:1 and C54:1) that are cleaved on pyrolysis to release fatty acids with C14:0, C16:0, C18:1 and C18:0 carbon atoms with C16:0 as the major cleavage product; thus Nocardia cyriacigeorgici has a cellular fatty acid profile that comprises saturated, unsaturated and 10-methyl branched fatty acids.
Possesses type PII phospholipids with significant amounts of phosphatidylethanolamine.

The menaquinone system consists of partially saturated menaquinones with eight isoprene units, in which the two terminal isoprene moieties are cyclized ; MK-8(H6) is the major menaquinone and minor amounts of 2,3-epoxy-MK-8(H6) are also present.
It hydrolyses aesculin, testosterone and urea but not adenine, casein, elastin, gelatin, guanine, hypoxanthine, keratin, tyrosine or xanthine.

Assimilates acetate, gluconate, sucrose and paraffin as carbon sources but not adipate, benzoate, citrate, lactate, arabinose, cellobiose, galactose, glucose, lactose, maltose, melezitose, raffinose, rhamnose, trehalose, xylose, adonitol, meso-erythritol, myo-inositol, mannitol, sorbitol, isoamyl alcohol, 2,3-butanediol, 1,2-propanediol, m-hydroxybenzoate or phydroxybenzoate.
Utilizes acetamide, but not alanine, gelatin, proline or serine, as simultaneous carbon and nitrogen sources.
The G+Â­C content of the DNA is 68.1 mol%.
The type strain is IMMIB D-1627T (=DSM 44484T), which was isolated from the bronchial secretion of a patient suffering from chronic bronchitis.
